answers.answer: I don't know how often infections occur with surgery, but it is a risk with any open surgery.  One can have pain from infection, but she is likely also having post-operative pain as well.  It can take a long time to recover from back surgery and sometimes, there can be permanent nerve damage in backs.  Regarding the infection- if your mom indeed has been tested and shown to have infection, they should be treating this with antibiotic.  Have they been?  And if the antibiotic has not knocked the infection out, I would think they should consider culturing the infection so they can pick the right type of antiobiotic to target the bacteria that is causing it.
Thanks for your reply.Yes they are treating here with Antibiotic.Not sure about the culture stuff. Will ask them about it.-Pradeep

question: My mother went through this surgery (for L4/L5). title: Post Operation Pain due to Infection
